text: Michael Crawford Chapman, A.S.C. (November 21, 1935 â€“ September 20, 2020) was an American cinematographer and movie director. He was known for his works with Martin Scorsese and Ivan Reitman. Chapman was born in New York City. His best known works was in Taxi Driver, Raging Bull, Space Jam and in The Fugitive. Chapman died from congestive heart failure on September 20, 2020, at his home in Los Angeles, aged 84. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:American cinematographers Category:Movie directors from New York City
title: Michael Chapman (cinematographer)
